definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
bijective map (i.e. map between sets in math. that is one-to-one and onto)/one-to-one correspondence

sentences.english: He enumerated to me the advantages of traveling by train .
sentences.chinese: 他为我一一举出搭火车旅行的好处。

sentences.english: He telleth the number of the stars; he calleth them all by their names.
sentences.chinese: 他数点星宿的数目，一一称它的名。

sentences.english: Yet, the drinks that burnt my throat became the story of our past, each in my mind, crystalized.
sentences.chinese: 但是入口的酒却变成往事，一一在我心头永恒。

sentences.english: Wanying smoothed the fragments patiently and reordered them together. Then she attentively read the letter twice.
sentences.chinese: 宛英耐心抚平团皱的碎片，一一拼上，仔细读了两遍。

sentences.english: We have comprehensive plans to achieve these goals.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经拟好了周详的计划，准备一一实现这些目标。

sentences.english: He said in the letter that he would like to tell him everything that had happened at sea.
sentences.chinese: 他在信中表示他想将海上所的事一一告诉克劳迪斯。

sentences.english: Unity and mutual assistance is the guarantee.
He telleth the number of the stars;
sentences.chinese: 他数点星宿的数目，一一称它的名。

sentences.english: But he has made similar moves before, only to abandon them.
sentences.chinese: 但是他曾经做过类似的行动，而之后都一一放弃。

sentences.english: and he just like, dates them all.
sentences.chinese: 让男士和女士们一一约会。

sentences.english: It depressed me to pick it all up and put it into yet another plastic bag.
sentences.chinese: 把它们一一捡起再放入另一个塑料袋让我很是反感。

sentences.english: All these things are coming together thanks to all my friends.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些事情一一办成，得感谢我所有的朋友。

sentences.english: I see bullet points in my head. I number everything.
sentences.chinese: 看到我头上的弹孔，我也会一一编号。

sentences.english: The lecture was well received and Christa answered all the questions raised by the students.
sentences.chinese: 最后，卢柯欣针对学生们提出的问题一一解答。

sentences.english: Pictures flash through my mind like an old film from the fifties.
sentences.chinese: 画面在脑中一一闪过，仿佛五十年代的老电影。

sentences.english: The manager checked out the tools to the workmen as they came to work.
sentences.chinese: 工人们来干活时，经理把工具一一登记后借给他们。

definition: to lump together/to treat along with all the others
variant of 一併|一并, to lump together/to treat along with all the others
